name: Nico Robin
text: Once Per Turn: If your (Straw Hat Crew) type Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may rest 1 of your DON!! cards instead.

effect.text: If your (Straw Hat Crew) type Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may rest 1 of your DON!! cards instead.
conditions: would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect
